Uses of Class
main.java.neat.visualizer.GenomeVisualizerBuilder

Packages that use GenomeVisualizerBuilder
Package Description
main.java.neat.visualizer  

  • Uses of GenomeVisualizerBuilder in main.java.neat.visualizer

    Methods in main.java.neat.visualizer that return GenomeVisualizerBuilder
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.defaultGenomeVisuals()
    Applies a predefined set of default visualization parameters: Node Size: 20px. Shape: Circle. Input Nodes: Green (#0f9900). Hidden Nodes: Red (#db2100). Output Nodes: Cyan (#00afbf). Positive Connections: Dark Red (#960032). Negative Connections: Purple (#320096).
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setDisabledConnectionColor​(java.lang.String disabledConnectionColor)
    Defines the color for disabled connections.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setHiddenNodeColor​(java.lang.String hiddenNodeColor)
    Specifies the color for hidden layer nodes.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setInputNodeColor​(java.lang.String inputNodeColor)
    Defines the color for input layer nodes.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setNegConnectionColor​(java.lang.String negConnectionColor)
    Configures the color for negative-weight connections.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setNegRecurrentConnectionColor​(java.lang.String negRecurrentConnectionColor)
    Sets the color for negative-weight recurrent connections.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setNodeBoundsColor​(java.lang.String nodeBoundsColor)
    Sets border color for nodes.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setNodeShape​(GenomeVisualizer.SHAPE nodeShape)
    Sets the geometric shape for nodes.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setNodeSize​(double nodeSize)
    Sets the diameter/width of nodes in pixels.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setNonActivatedNodeColor​(java.lang.String nonActivatedNodeColor)
    Sets color for inactive nodes.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setOutputNodeColor​(java.lang.String outputNodeColor)
    Sets the color for output layer nodes.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setPosConnectionColor​(java.lang.String posConnectionColor)
    Configures the color for positive-weight connections.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder GenomeVisualizerBuilder.setPosRecurrentConnectionColor​(java.lang.String posRecurrentConnectionColor)
    Sets the color for positive-weight recurrent connections.
